title: AVK Fasteners | Home
text: Products AVK opened in 1983 to focus on the design and manufacture of blind installed threaded inserts and studs. Learn MoreInstallation Tools We offer installation tools to meet your needs: pneumatic, battery-powered, manual, and automated. Learn MoreApplications AVK Fasteners are used in almost every industry. View examples of typical applications for AVK prooducts. Learn MoreSales Reps Our Engineers and Sales Reps are expertly trained to assist in developing creative fastening solutions. Learn MoreAVK's Quality Management System All aspects of our business are controlled and certified to the exacting requirements of ISO/TS16949 and ISO 9001 International standards.
